thread.title: Italy's Vincenzo Nibali wins Tour of Lombardy
thread.title_full: Italy's Vincenzo Nibali wins Tour of Lombardy - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Italy's Vincenzo Nibali wins Tour of Lombardy
text:
COMO (Italy): Italy's Vincenzo Nibali won the Tour of Lombardy on Sunday after launching a daring attack 17.5km from the finish to triumph in the final cycling 'monument' of the season.
Nibali, the 2014 Tour de France champion, held off late chasers to cross the line in Como, after a 245km ride from Bergamo, just over 20sec ahead of Spaniard Daniel Moreno with Frenchman Thibaut Pinot finishing a close third.
